StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetSemesterInfo]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@NWARowId uniqueiden..er
AS SET NOCOUNT ON
SELECT ID, n.[rowguid] As NWARowId, [SemesterName], [SemesterGPA]
FROM [MCRISS].[USMC].[PooleeSemesterInfo] si INNER JOIN nwa n ON si.NWA_ID = n.NWA_ID
WHERE n.rowguid = @NWARowId
--- CLEAN UP SET NOCOUNT OFF
